title: Easy to use and make edits.
name: Angela P.
pros: Pros: Sparxo is great to use for events - its easy to track guests as well as collaborate with fellow event co-organizers. The layout is very easy to learn and create events. I like the event splash page which personalizes your event and the app which allows you to easily check in guests. Sparxo's customer service is also excellent and they are very responsive if you have any questions.
cons: Cons: Working on building the community recognition of the brand. As some people are unaware of Sparxo - I have to explain what the company is.
overall: Overall: Easy to track customer data.

title: I've been using Sparxo for ticketing on the University of Colorado Ski Bus and it's been great.
name: Brandon S.
pros: Pros: The ability to quickly create trips, manage customers, and download rosters. Our customers like the ability to easily purchase tickets and not need yet another username and password to remember in order to do so. With tickets being purchased solely on Facebook it makes a one-stop platform where our customers also ask me questions via their messenger platform.
cons: Cons: A few items aren't incredibly intuitive, but once you know how to use it administration tasks go quickly and smoothly.

title: I've used Sparxo for about 3 years; I love the great features and cool user experience!
name: Al P.
pros: Pros: I like that the user interface is very friendly and intuitive. You don't need to be a tech wizard to be able to use this software. I also like that I can add multiple photos, images and even sound and video files directly to my event site. It's incredible to be able to promote and showcase my events in a more dynamic way, beyond just one image.
cons: Cons: I wish that the ability to manage and generate the reports would be more robust. I also wish that the ability to make sure attendee guest info are captured in the RSVP is more intuitive.
overall: Overall: The main benefit is that it is very user-friendly, fun to use and not intimidating for folks who are not tech-savvy. And because of that, I could create an event on Sparxo quickly, thus saving me time.

title: We love how beautifully and easily sparxo integrates with our website and on Facebook.
name: Shay K.
pros: Pros: The sparxo calendar is amazing. As well as the plugins for web and social. All the features on the backend are elegant and easy to use.
cons: Cons: I really wish I could communicate with ticket holders through the app. Sending a message or an email would be really helpful as all our events are offsite and we don't have access to a laptop and sometimes we need to reach a customer.

title: Sparxo has been great for pop-up events with my non-profit, taking care of ticketing and publishing
name: Max K.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, and flexible to coordinate with a team around. We have multiple pop-up events a year, and this helps us promote and publish them quickly.
cons: Cons: Software is geared toward ticketing, which is a bit different than our free events. Additional flexibility with scheduling / managing attendees would be helpful, though I'll be honest, I haven't done a deep dive with all of the current features. Text notifications to attendees would also be helpful.

title: Sparxo is simple, fast and east to use!
name: Rebecca C.
pros: Pros: Our organization loves the ability to create events, keep track of who is coming, and remind quests that the event is coming up.
overall: Overall: Ability to gain new followers and see what is happening in the community. There is a lot to explore on the Sparxo software and it can be overwhelming, but if you keep it simple its smooth and easy!

title: Easy to set up and to manage from beginning to end
name: Samuel B.
pros: Pros: Ease to set up and manage event attendance. The splash page, website and facebook integration works seamlessly.
cons: Cons: Lack of Salesforce integration and integration on other social channels. Wish that Sparxo could be more integrated with FB as well.
overall: Overall: Increased ticket sales for charity events and the option to pass the fees on the event goer has saved us money over the last 2 years.

title: Awesome feature set
name: Michel N.
pros: Pros: Very user-friendly and they keep adding great features to help event organizers streamline event prep and interact with attendees. Love the widgets for ticket purchasing!
overall: Overall: Sometimes the integration between the ticketing and the processing gateway isn't perfect, but it certainly is better than the alternatives we have looked at.

title: Great platform!
name: Nittu B.
pros: Pros: User-friendlycolor layoutGreat customer serviceGreat value compared to competitorsOverall I like the product you have created
cons: Cons: losing data from an expired event ( how much was each ticket)

title: Very easy to use for us as clients and for our customers who buy tickets.
name: Florence B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. So many features to add on for our different events. Favorite feature: possibility of adding questions for our customers and deciding on the type of answer to give (short, multiple choice, etc.)
cons: Cons: Customer service was not so efficient. I asked a question, as my issue was not part of the FAQ. took minimum two weeks to get an answer and by then I had found a solution myself

title: Sparxo is a great all-in-one platform for everywhere we need to promote our events.
name: Max K.
pros: Pros: It's easy to update and change, and is able to post to our website, Facebook, and marketing screens. It's great to be able to update once and have it go everywhere.
cons: Cons: No real downsides that come to mind. There are features that I'd like to see, including SMS notifications and additional customizations, but I haven't really thought to spent time getting more out of the platform.

title: Sparxo is a simple and clean event platform.
name: Elizabeth G.
pros: Pros: Simple, clean interface, availability of integration codes, how it looks on our website, ease of RSVPs and landing pages.
cons: Cons: Need to roll out more features such as recurring events, delete an event, carry over the times when cloning.
overall: Overall: Good embedded calendar for our website. Collects RSVP info and sends confirmation emails.

title: The best event ticketing platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's very easy to use and gives you a lot of alternatives to personalize your event guests. The support team are always there whenever you need it, and they help you in any doubt that you can have.
cons: Cons: The app for check in isn't working for iOS 12. That could be a problem for iPhone user that have updated the software and they want to do the check in their cell phones.
overall: Overall: I prefer to use Sparxo instead of any other ticketing platform. I think that the strength of the company is its team, because you have a 24/7 team that kindly helps you in any doubt or problem.

title: Its very easy. We don't have have think a lot about it.
name: Ryan G.
pros: Pros: We have it working in a very automatic way, so we don't have to put much thought or effort into maintaining things.
cons: Cons: Would be happier if it were a little more universally known and accepted. We have clients that still have issues interfacing.

title: The best reasonably priced event management software
name: Greg S.
pros: Pros: Nearly free (unlike Eventbrite) for real events. Even easier to make a good looking event page, too!
cons: Cons: It's missing some of the helpful power features of Eventbrite. But for the price, it's worth it.

title: Was clean and simple to use.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I liked how minimal the design of it all was. I appreciated how easy it was to get started. From what I recall the fees weren't too high either.
cons: Cons: I like using the bouncer app by UPALLNIGHT, in order to bring all my ticket vendors together for one easy check in process. Wish it connected to bouncer. I also don't like how there isn't a massive community around sparxo like eventbrite or upallnight, where people might stumble across my event.
overall: Overall: To be totally fair, I don't see any benefit to using Sparxo vs all the other ticket vendors. I would prefer a ticket vendor that has a massive community.

title: I use Sparxo for my live ticketed events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like this software because you can easily share in your networks, you can access a predetermined splash page, and you can easily grab the embed code and put it right on your website. No muss, no fuss.
cons: Cons: I wish sparxo had a 'shopping cart' feature...and wasn't just event based. I also wish they had an events listing like Eventbrite does.
overall: Overall: Ease of use for posting events. Very easy to link to Stripe for payment.

title: Very customizable platform for beginners!
name: Eduardo A.
pros: Pros: The ability for nonprofits to take donations without a charge. Designing A Difference benefits by creating events and successfully keeping track of who is coming and when to let them know about the next event.
cons: Cons: Can be complex with so many options but help is always there.

title: Excellent! I'm new to sparxo and already loving it!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Their personal attention to their customers is impressive. My husband and I love the live chat option. We love being able to get things done quickly and when we have help that is willing to assist quickly then we appreciate that!
cons: Cons: I hate that we can't integrate our social media or link our social media to sparxo. Being able to share more with our customers about who we are and the events that we are hosting through social media would be helpful. Other than that, no complaints really.

title: We use SPARXO yearly and LOVE IT!
name: angela b.
pros: Pros: I like that everything is easy to access,change and update as needed,the way to contact all parties involved via Sparxo is amazing and does the work for you in a way!
overall: Overall: Knowing good people. Dealing with the reps during all events is easy and friendly,never have an issue

title: I'm a big fan of Sparxo - their customer service, the way it looks and integrates into our site.
name: Leah S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Above all their customer service is great. Very responsive and willing to work with you. They even built a custom landing page for us before our website was live. It has all of the functionality you need in ticket sales and lots of customizable options, which is great. I really like the look of the calendar, it works well with our website and branding.
overall: Overall: Easy set up, great functionality. I like the collaborator option, the calendar and how it looks. There are still some functionality improvements to make, but they take feedback very well and make updates.

title: Great platform for what it does.
name: Da L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use and seamless. Makes it extremely easy to set up events and distribute tickets to our participants and clients. Its easy to track guests. I enjoy the event splash page which personalizes your event. Sparxo's customer service is also awesome and they are very responsive if you have any questions.
cons: Cons: Nothing horrible about the program thus far. I would like to see a better mobile platform but it's fine for my low traffic usage. I wish we could more easily create discount bundles by clicking on existing ticket types rather than creating another ticket tier/type. I also think most people are unaware of this

title: I was very very pleased with the amount of service and attention we received.
name: Elizabeth S.
pros: Pros: It was easy to implement, easy to use, and easy to have a snapshot of how our event was progressing.
cons: Cons: I wish there was a way to comment on some of the payments, to share between the team. There probably is a way to do it, but I don't know how. In all honesty I didn't really experience any cons for the software.
overall: Overall: Easy implementation, easy sales.

title: Amazing ticketing app, esp for community events. Terrific customer support.
name: Prisna N.
pros: Pros: I love that we have access to the people we reach, that we can connect with them and continue offering more workshops and events. I love that they stay in the Facebook event universe, rather than going to another ticketing app with other ads. I also love how seamless the payment and check-in features are. It's been indispensable for creating workshops, getting people to pre-sign waivers, pre-pay, check-in.
cons: Cons: I wish we could more easily create discount bundles by clicking on existing ticket types rather than creating another ticket tier/type.
overall: Overall: please see review - listed them there :)

title: I'm not very tech savvy, pretty easy.
name: Anna C.
pros: Pros: This software is pretty approachable, I can figure it out on my own for the most part. If I have issues I can reach out for support
cons: Cons: It's technology! Sometimes tech is a challenge! Otherwise, I like it and find it easy to use. The app is pretty self explanatory.
overall: Overall: I was able to host a ticketable event online and promote with links for purchasing. I have then recommended to others for the same purpose.

title: We've only had wonderful experiences using Sparxo over past two years.
name: Stacy W.
pros: Pros: The platform is easy to work with especially the main event information page and guest information. The Facebook integration was a big help as well.

title: Sparxo is the best platform to use to drive traffic to our events!
name: Juliette R.
pros: Pros: I love the versatility of options Sparxo allows users to take advantage of. It's one of my favorite resources to utilize when I'm planning and coordinating an event. I love that it aids my workflow in understanding which volunteers RSVP for an event and sends reminders to each volunteer.

title: I was one of the early Portland adopters, and have recommended it to many. Everyone is satisfied!
name: Chris A.
pros: Pros: Easy interface. It makes updating my listings a breeze. The support is excellent. They've even taken into consideration some of my suggestions and incorporated them into the software.
overall: Overall: Anything that I've thought would be a help, they've listened and updated!

title: The staff communicate with excellence and make clients feel valued and important.
name: Dr Rollan R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Sparxo has a great layout and passes the fees along. Organizers have greater flexibility in ticketing and fee options with a clean interface. I also love the gamification aspect of encouraging sharing of events.
cons: Cons: The inability to link social media platforms and lack of scalable fees similar to Sparxo's fees is a struggle.

title: It's been good thus far
name: Colin R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: How easy it is to share with a co host event. I have not used this enough to really have stronger feedback as I have been introduced to this from other event organizers
cons: Cons: Navigation is a little tough to learn. Again I have not used this enough to have strong feedback but overall it has been a good tool for new events.

title: We integrated Sparxo with our website in a few easy steps.
name: Darren M.
pros: Pros: It's easy to use. We just dropped the code into our website, it took very little effort on our part.
cons: Cons: Not as tightly integrated as I'd like but we need to revisit it. We are about to set up an event calendar system with ticketing integrated. Thank you for reminding me to circle back with Sparxo!

title: Easy to set up with great support, look and feel enhanced our brand.
name: Susan F.
pros: Pros: That it made us look so good! Start up restaurant event and pow, perfect presentation. Users felt that their purchase was secure and they got immediate feedback.
cons: Cons: Not being as tech savvy as some, the setup did require support call to clarify a few things. Once walked through and the technical issues were rectified it performed flawlessly.

title: Love using the Sparxo app - easy and convenient
name: Peter C.
pros: Pros: Convenient, quick, and super easy to use. Love their customer service as they are willing to get on the phone with you any time.
cons: Cons: I addressed this directly to Sparxo in the past - had to do with customers who found a way to get away with refunds and still have etickets to an event
overall: Overall: Great quality and customer service

title: Very simply and pleasant looking interface.
name: Michael T.
pros: Pros: I like the interface and the use. The options are good as well. Customer service is EXCELLENT! Able to fix my problems on site when needed. Gave G House NYC a great review!
cons: Cons: Sometimes ticket times are over looked and my sales end earlier then the event should. So double checking before I send out but the times should be automatically set along with the times of event.
overall: Overall: Email list, cross platforms with instagram and Facebook.

title: Great platform but pricey otherwise
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love the templates which allows greater impact online presence .I was amazed of all the choices that could be used .
cons: Cons: Once again we have to go back and look at cost is it worth charging the excessive fee to the customer
overall: Overall: Not enough to justify the costs and overall event budget

title: Fantastic tool for events!
name: Marian L.
pros: Pros: It's very simple to use and almost addicting to use. I've been creating all my events with Sparxo. The layout is beautiful and the process of registering for an event is very simple and smooth. I also love the charts and sharing options.
cons: Cons: I haven't found anything that I don't like. Every time I had a question, I received support immediately.

title: Frustrating
name: Kimberlea K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
cons: Cons: There is no automatic waitlist option, it is overly complicated to access guest lists, the software must have been created by someone with zero events experience as all common sense functionality is missing, the help pages are BLANK, and the customer service takes hours to respond and then is useless.
overall: Overall: None

title: I have had a fantastic experience with Sparxo. I love how it can easily integrate.
name: Brad C.
pros: Pros: I like how it can integrate into my websites, socials, etc. Also how I can keep my customer data rather than share with competitors.
overall: Overall: I have seen that users may be so used to Eventbrite that they may feel a sense of familiarity with that.

title: Flexible, Easy to Use Platform that works well.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ability to embed into a website.Simple event landing pages.Easy integration into payment processor.
cons: Cons: Setup UI can be hard to navigate if it's been a while.Graphic cropping not ideal for the banner header.

title: love it!
name: Charlie W.
pros: Pros: The website and platform is very easy to use. it's easy to navigate and I don't catch any snags when using.
cons: Cons: The website and platform feel a touch out of date. That being said, it's still easy to use. Although it feels a bit dated.
overall: Overall: Ticket sales

title: It's a great platform that gives you a lot of tools to manage the assistance of your event
name: Jerico V.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The platform is very easy to use. It has different ways to register the participants of your event. Also, the customer service is very efficient. They help you until you get a solution.
cons: Cons: I think they should improve the post-graphics that you can get after the event is over. Also, they can let the customers add more filters or modify the name of the filters that are already set up.

title: Easy and efficient
name: Michiko W.
pros: Pros: What I like most about this software is that it is user friendly. I almost never run into problems and when I do customer service is quick and responsive.

title: Sparxo has been a great platform to use. What I like most about it is its white-labeling feature
name: NUPUR S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: the fact the I can white label the event, host it from my site and that my users don't have to leave my platform at all. I feel I have more control
cons: Cons: I can't email within this platform. I wish I could send an invitation via this platform to my attendees

title: My experience to date has been outstanding.
name: Mark Anthony J.
pros: Pros: Easy to use - the software is very simple and allows you to change directions if needed quickly. I suggest it to everyone . I made a suggestion about a year ago regarding alphatizing the final list & the developers implemented it in days. I am a fan.

title: Mixed impressions
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It was very easy and fast to sign up and create an account.
cons: Cons: I was looking for a specific feature in their app in order to integrate it with my existing workflow. I did not find it and ask my account to be deleted. Despite a positive confirmation, I am still receiving emails from them.

title: Easy, fast, and smooth experience during events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I manage a lot of volunteers. With Sparxo , I can manage and check in people with ease. lifts a lot of pressure on volunteers conducting check in at events.
overall: Overall: It does it's job well, and my organization uses it for almost every event.

title: I mainly use event ticket platforms for free events and I was frustrated user and went to Eventbrite
name: Emanne D.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: the drag and drop features were cool for customizing event page. It took me a second to figure out how to use this though. I had not yet seen examples of what a Sparxo event page looks like so I was confused.
cons: Cons: Did not save my work when I was creating multiple events. Did not quite understand how to create an event my first time. A quick automated tutorial would have been helpful.

title: depends on customer support
name: Martin C.
pros: Pros: the ability to accept credit / debit cards at an event and capture customer details for follow uppossibility
cons: Cons: collaboration feature failure in the case of the second event that I used (a clone of the first event)leading to lost payments

title: We used Sparxo for an event we had never done before. It made management truly a breeze.
name: Juliette F.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The interface was easy to understand and the graphic output made sense to me. I like the real time updating. It made it really easy to keep track of where we were in filling the event.
cons: Cons: There are a few more features I'd suggest but nothing crazy- maybe a few options on how to view the information.

title: I liked the experience but didn't work well for my event specifically since audience wasn't engaged
name: Isabelle C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: User interface and clarity and distinction between various different levels of tickets. It also is very clean and pleasing to the eye.
cons: Cons: At the end of the day I think a lack of getting our users to understand a new platform and being able to fully integrate it into our event is why we didn't end up committing to using this platform as fully as we could.

title: Easy to use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is easy and user-friendly. It is very aesthetically pleasing. It seems like people are able to be creative with their event postings

title: pleasant, helpful
name: mary y.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: usability, intuitiveness, helped to streamline the process of registering for an event - made my life easier as the event planner
cons: Cons: don't have too many complaints. would like to have it integrate with our CRM, Chamber Master, but that might be too niche

title: Easy Peasy
name: Jonathan C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Sparxo makes it very easy to put together an event large or small. From implementation, ticketing, to making event changes, to the final guest list--all very simple.
cons: Cons: So far, I haven't come across any huge issues. The ability to connect into other payment gateways would be appreciated.

title: Our coworking space didn't benefit from it
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We haven't used it as much. Signed up, created an event. It was easy to use but not what our members wanted.
cons: Cons: It's not functional for us, members did not engage with the system. They would rather just get an email notification.

title: I couldnt believe just how one of the customer rep was available and helpful!!! LOVE the live support
name: Laurence S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use! The interface is so easy to navigate which makes the user experience fun to use, i'd reccomend it to anybody!
cons: Cons: I think the only downfall to the software from the comments I've gathered during our event was the price. In terms on the "sparxo quote" the prices is pretty steep compared to other similar services.
overall: Overall: 24/7 support from her through facebook messenger was key to our event's success! The Sparxo team cares just as much as we do, it's remarkable!

title: Great so far.
name: Aleea W.
pros: Pros: Everything in one place. Even though its not always my idea of "right" I can always make it fit the needs of what i'm doing.
overall: Overall: Everything in one place. Phenomenal customer support (thanks Crystle!).

title: A perfect solution if you need create a event with free or pay entry
name: Giuseppe Z.
pros: Pros: The support and the elastic costumize. The sparxo team has create a perfect solution for all person, company and event.

title: Easy to use!
name: Amy J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Great for small businesses. Not too costly which is a great help & makes it easy to promote on our own website.
cons: Cons: Doesn't generate quite as much foot traffic as other bigger name ticket websites. It's nice that it can go on our website but the foot traffic of search engines and being on a big companies website helps a bit too.

title: easy, simple and return customer
name: Alex t.
pros: Pros: i enjoy how easily it is to navigate through statistics and information pertaining to the event. I like how the graphs and charts make it easy to see the numbers in a different way.

title: Sparxo makes selling tickets for events so easy!
name: Kate G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I love that you can find out who is buying tickets! It makes it very easy to see who is attending and who needs a reminder.

title: Great product!
name: Dr. Liz P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: This is an easy to use, beautiful platform. So much more user friendly than the competitors! Plus I love the integrations with FB and wordpress
cons: Cons: Still a bit clunky at times when setting up events, but I trust it will continue to improve. Not many cons, honestly

title: We have had a wonderful experience. Crystle is great to work with!
name: Crystal T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Sparxo is very intuitive to use and implement within our website. We love using this platform for our events as well as membership and donations.
cons: Cons: I believe the front end mobile interface could be improved. We like the way that Sparxo embeds into our website however when we would like to see more on mobile instead of just a buy ticket button or an event card.

title: Modern design makes it easy to use!
name: Tilde I.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to understand! You just log in and get things done. Good costumer service with quick and clear answers.
cons: Cons: Not being able to import qr-codes from other softwares. That is the One thing I'm missing, since I can't combine the softwares I'm using.

title: It was very convenient to use
name: Tamara W.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The software was easy to use, to set up the platform and the transition from the account to my bank account.

title: Great platform to show our upcoming events in our coworking space. No issues have really come up.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to enter information in and have it show up on our events page and on our website.
cons: Cons: Sometimes a few errors or picture rendering happen but are always fixed asap by the Sparxo team. The customer service is great.

title: used Sparxo to check guests into a conference and had no issues after setup
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: easy to use
cons: Cons: setup is not intuitive

title: Sparxo is great! Very easy to use and intuitive
name: Eric S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Super easy to use, waitlist functionality works perfectly and the design is really professional. Way better than Eventbrite!
